description: This file is an ESLint configuration file for a Vue.js project, which imports plugins and configurations for Vue, TypeScript, and Vitest, and exports a combined configuration using defineConfigWithVueTs.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Function to define ESLint configuration with Vue and TypeScript support, combining different config parts into a single configuration object.

methods.name: vueTsConfigs
methods.description: Object containing Vue TypeScript ESLint configurations, including 'recommended'.
